metadata.description: Welcome to your new web 3 gaming platform (https://www.gamesonchain.com/games). This NFT is a promotion to earn free MATIC tokens by playing on the platform. All you need to do is log into our discord (https://discord.gg/aV66rnpc) and tell community manager Nick that you are here from the opensea promotion! Then play 10 hands on the platform to earn your $25 in Matic! Easy as that! Good luck and enjoy!
metadata.name: Gamesonchain Promotion!
